	<TD colspan=2 class="tr10 td144"><P class="p51 ft2">1. Utan hinder</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr10 td44"><P class="p15 ft2">av</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr10 td98"><P class="p50 ft2">bestämmel-</P></TD>

	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">sondern einer anderen Person zu,</P></TD>
</TR>

	<TD colspan=6 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">hinder av bestämmelserna i artik-</P></TD>

	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">kontrollerande inflytande på denna</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">wenn er auf diese andere Person</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr5 td156"><P class="p15 ft2">andra person.</P></TD>

<TR>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">ligrättslig juridisk person i endera</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr4 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>

<TR>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">staten till fysisk person på grund av</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td81"><P class="p15 ft2">lichen Rechts eines der beiden</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>

<TR>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">utfört arbete samt sådan ersättning</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr5 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>

<TR>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">som anges i punkt 4, beskattas</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td139"><P class="p15 ft2">für</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td94"><P class="p73 ft2">geleistete</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td11"><P class="p60 ft2">Dienste</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td58"><P class="p76 ft2">gezahlt</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>

	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">endast i denna stat. Sådan ersätt-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td81"><P class="p15 ft2">werden, sowie die in Absatz 4</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>

<TR>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">ning beskattas emellertid endast i</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr5 td29"><P class="p15 ft2">genannten Vergütungen,</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td58"><P class="p76 ft2">können</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">den andra avtalsslutande staten, om</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td81"><P class="p15 ft2">nur in diesem Staat besteuert</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">arbetet utförs i denna stat och</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td81"><P class="p15 ft2">werden. Diese Vergütungen kön-</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">personen i fråga har hemvist i</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr5 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">denna stat och är medborgare där</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr4 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>

	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">nicht als Abzug im Sinne dieser</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td57"><P class="p15 ft2">melse.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td46"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td64"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td118"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td126"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td65"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td132"><P class="p15 ft2">Bestimmung.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td126"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td120"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td42"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td6"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td23"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td141"><P class="p51 ft2">2. Studerande</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td64"><P class="p1 ft2">eller</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td91"><P class="p55 ft9">person</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td65"><P class="p50 ft2">som</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr5 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">(2) Zahlungen, die ein Student</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">undergår utbildning inom industri,</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">oder ein in einem gewerblichen,</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">teknik, jordbruk eller skogsbruk</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">technischen, land- oder forst-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td57"><P class="p15 ft2">(praktikant</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td46"><P class="p1 ft2">däri</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td158"><P class="p71 ft2">inbegripen)</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td65"><P class="p50 ft2">och</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr5 td147"><P class="p15 ft2">wirtschaftlichen</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr5 td147"><P class="p17 ft2">Lehrverhältnis</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">som har eller omedelbart före</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td94"><P class="p15 ft2">Stehender</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td203"><P class="p78 ft2">(einschließlich</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td23"><P class="p17 ft2">eines</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">inresa till en avtalsslutande stat</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">Praktikanten), der sich in einem</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">hade hemvist i den andra avtals-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr5 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">Vertragsstaat ausschließlich zum</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">slutande staten och som vistas i den</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td94"><P class="p15 ft2">Studium</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td89"><P class="p15 ft2">oder</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td120"><P class="p65 ft2">zu</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td106"><P class="p17 ft2">Ausbildung</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">förstnämnda staten uteslutande för</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">aufhält und der im anderen Ver-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">studier eller utbildning, beskattas</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr5 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">tragsstaat ansässig ist oder dort</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">inte i denna stat för belopp som han</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">unmittelbar vor der Einreise in</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">erhåller för sitt uppehälle, sina</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">den erstgenannten Staat ansässig</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">studier eller sin utbildning, under</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr5 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">war, für seinen Unterhalt, sein</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td141"><P class="p15 ft2">förutsättning att</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td117"><P class="p71 ft2">beloppen</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td52"><P class="p50 ft2">härrör</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td132"><P class="p15 ft2">Studium oder</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td26"><P class="p72 ft2">seine</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td106"><P class="p17 ft2">Ausbildung</P></TD>

	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">håller sig emellertid rätten att</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td166"><P class="p15 ft2">Deutschland behält</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td118"><P class="p70 ft2">aber</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td65"><P class="p17 ft2">das</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">beakta den undantagna inkomsten</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td116"><P class="p15 ft2">Recht,</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td87"><P class="p15 ft2">die</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td175"><P class="p71 ft2">so</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td160"><P class="p17 ft2">ausgenommenen</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">och förmögenheten vid bestäm-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td58"><P class="p15 ft2">Einkünfte</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td175"><P class="p15 ft2">und</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr5 td160"><P class="p17 ft2">Vermögenswerte</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">mandet av skattesatsen för annan</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">bei der Festsetzung des Steuer-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">inkomst och förmögenhet. Före-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">satzes für andere Einkünfte und</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">gående bestämmelser gäller även i</P></TD>

	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td8"><P class="p50 ft2">melserna i artikel 15 punkt 4,</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr12 td129"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr12 td197"><P class="p28 ft24"><SPAN class="ft23">20 </SPAN>Underpunkterna i artikel 23 punkt b) har genom ändringsprotokollet den 18 januari 2023</P></TD>

	<TD rowspan=2 class="tr6 td129"><P class="p29 ft2">36</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr17 td197"><P class="p28 ft24">fått ett nytt numreringsformat i den tyska språkversionen. Underpunkterna har <NOBR>1)–4)</NOBR> hade</P></TD>

<P class="p37 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">–</SPAN><SPAN class="ft31">med iakttagande av bestämmel- steuert werden können, so rechnet serna i svensk lagstiftning (även i Schweden unter Beachtung der den lydelse den framdeles kan få Bestimmungen des schwedischen genom att ändras utan att den Steuerrechts (unter Beachtung der allmänna princip som anges här jeweils anzuwendenden Änderun- ändras) – från skatten på inkomsten gen, die den allgemeinen Grund- avräkna ett belopp motsvarande satz dieser Bestimmungen unbe- den skatt som erlagts i Förbunds- rührt lassen) auf seine von diesen republiken Tyskland för inkom- Einkünften erhobene Steuer den</SPAN></P>

<TR>
	<TD class="tr2 td50"><P class="p124 ft9">sten.</P></TD>

	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">under utdelningsåret eller tidigare</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">Gesellschaft im Jahr der Aus-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">år mottagit på bolagsandelar som</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr5 td53"><P class="p15 ft9">schüttung oder in früheren Jahren</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">bolaget innehar i bolag med hem-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td111"><P class="p15 ft2">aus Gesellschaftsanteilen</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td41"><P class="p17 ft2">emp-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">vist i tredje stat och vilken hade</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">fangen hat, die sie an einer in</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">varit undantagen från svensk skatt</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td100"><P class="p15 ft2">einem dritten</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td73"><P class="p79 ft2">Staate</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td11"><P class="p17 ft2">ansässigen</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td118"><P class="p15 ft2">om</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td59"><P class="p54 ft9">bolagsandelarna</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td86"><P class="p15 ft2">för</P></TD>

	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">Gesellschaft hält und die frei-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">utdelningen betalas innehafts direkt</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">gestellt worden wären, wenn die</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">av bolaget med hemvist i Sverige.</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr5 td75"><P class="p52 ft9">staterna</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td23"><P class="p65 ft2">eller</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td118"><P class="p50 ft2">för</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr5 td194"><P class="p15 ft2">Gebietskörperschaften</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td11"><P class="p70 ft2">erhoben</P></TD>
</TR>

	<TD class="tr4 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>

	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td191"><P class="p50 ft2">underavdelningar</P></TD>

	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td135"><P class="p71 ft2">eller lokala myndigheter, om be-</P></TD>

<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr4 td44"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td13"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td132"><P class="p51 ft2">c) lämna</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td142"><P class="p15 ft2">upplysningar</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td55"><P class="p50 ft2">som</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td130"><P class="p24 ft2">c) Informationen</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td46"><P class="p70 ft2">zu</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td7"><P class="p17 ft2">erteilen,</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td89"><P class="p15 ft2">skulle</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td116"><P class="p126 ft2">röja</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr5 td134"><P class="p50 ft2">affärshemlighet,</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr5 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">die ein <NOBR>Betriebs-,</NOBR> <NOBR>Geschäfts-,</NOBR></P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2"><NOBR>industri-,</NOBR> handels- eller yrkes-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2"><NOBR>Gewerbe-,</NOBR> Handels- oder Berufs-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">hemlighet eller i näringsverksam-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">geheimnis oder ein Geschäftsver-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td132"><P class="p15 ft2">het nyttjat</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td142"><P class="p74 ft2">förfaringssätt</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td55"><P class="p50 ft2">eller</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr5 td130"><P class="p15 ft2">fahren preisgeben</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr5 td142"><P class="p17 ft2">würden oder</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">upplysningar, vilkas överlämnande</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td64"><P class="p15 ft2">deren</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td199"><P class="p17 ft2">Erteilung der öffentlichen</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">skulle strida mot allmänna hänsyn</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">Ordnung (<SPAN class="ft3">ordre public</SPAN>) wider-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td71"><P class="p15 ft3"><SPAN class="ft2">(</SPAN>ordre public<SPAN class="ft2">).</SPAN></P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td116"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td87"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td99"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td94"><P class="p15 ft2">spräche.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td99"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td136"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td136"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td210"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td44"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td13"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p50 ft2">4. Då en avtalsslutande stat begär</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td93"><P class="p24 ft2">(4) Ersucht</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td136"><P class="p56 ft2">ein</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td142"><P class="p17 ft2">Vertragsstaat</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td132"><P class="p15 ft2">upplysningar</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td20"><P class="p15 ft2">enligt</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td116"><P class="p73 ft2">denna</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td55"><P class="p50 ft2">artikel</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">gemäß diesem Artikel um Infor-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">ska den andra avtalsslutande staten</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr5 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">mationen, so nutzt der andere</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">använda de medel som denna stat</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">Vertragsstaat die ihm zur Verfü-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">förfogar över för att inhämta de</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td64"><P class="p15 ft2">gung</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td127"><P class="p78 ft2">stehenden</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td142"><P class="p17 ft2">Möglichkeiten</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">begärda upplysningarna, även om</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr5 td130"><P class="p15 ft2">zur Beschaffung</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td136"><P class="p15 ft2">der</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td210"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td7"><P class="p17 ft2">erbetenen</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">denna andra stat inte har behov av</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td93"><P class="p15 ft2">Informationen,</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td80"><P class="p71 ft2">selbst</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td210"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td7"><P class="p17 ft2">wenn er</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">upplysningarna för sina egna be-</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td64"><P class="p15 ft2">diese</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td141"><P class="p71 ft2">Informationen</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td210"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td44"><P class="p15 ft2">für</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td13"><P class="p17 ft2">seine</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">skattningsändamål. Förpliktelsen i</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td94"><P class="p15 ft2">eigenen</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td31"><P class="p81 ft2">steuerlichen</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td210"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td7"><P class="p17 ft2">Zwecke</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td71"><P class="p15 ft2">föregående mening</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td58"><P class="p73 ft2">begränsas</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td99"><P class="p50 ft2">av</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">nicht benötigt. Die in Satz 1</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">bestämmelserna i punkt 3, men</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td94"><P class="p15 ft2">enthaltene</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td62"><P class="p78 ft2">Verpflichtung</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td13"><P class="p17 ft2">unter-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">detta medför inte en rätt för en</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td64"><P class="p15 ft2">liegt</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td120"><P class="p15 ft2">den</P></TD>

</TR>

	<TD colspan=2 class="tr10 td109"><P class="p51 ft2">(1) Die</P></TD>

	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td83"><P class="p74 ft2">gegenseitige</P></TD>

	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">der Erhebung von Steueransprü-</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr5 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr5 td135"><P class="p71 ft2">gränsas inte av artiklarna 1 och 2.</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr5 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">chen. Diese Amtshilfe wird durch</P></TD>

<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td135"><P class="p71 ft2">De behöriga myndigheterna i de</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">die Artikel 1 und 2 nicht einge-</P></TD>

<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td154"><P class="p71 ft2">avtalsslutande staterna</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td139"><P class="p15 ft2">får</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td84"><P class="p50 ft2">träffa</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">schränkt. Die zuständigen Behör-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr5 td135"><P class="p71 ft2">överenskommelse om den närmare</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td109"><P class="p15 ft2">den der</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr5 td159"><P class="p70 ft2">Vertragsstaaten können</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td135"><P class="p71 ft2">tillämpningen av denna artikel.</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">durch Verständigung regeln, wie</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td116"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td65"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td123"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td86"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td139"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td84"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">dieser Artikel durchzuführen ist.</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr5 td135"><P class="p50 ft2">2. Med uttrycket ”skattefordran”</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td109"><P class="p51 ft2">(2) Der</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td117"><P class="p127 ft9">Ausdruck</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td113"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td11"><P class="p70 ft2">‚Steueran-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td135"><P class="p71 ft2">förstås i denna artikel en fordran på</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">spruch‘ im Sinne dieses Artikels</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td135"><P class="p71 ft2">ett belopp avseende skatter av varje</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">bedeutet einen Betrag, der auf-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr5 td135"><P class="p71 ft2">slag och beskaffenhet som tas ut för</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr5 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">grund von Steuern jeder Art und</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td92"><P class="p71 ft2">de avtalsslutande staterna,</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td84"><P class="p50 ft2">deras</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td66"><P class="p15 ft2">Bezeichnung,</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td136"><P class="p53 ft2">die</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td42"><P class="p73 ft2">für</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td11"><P class="p70 ft2">Rechnung</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td135"><P class="p71 ft2">politiska underavdelningar eller lo-</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td41"><P class="p15 ft2">der</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td174"><P class="p1 ft2">Vertragsstaaten</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td113"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td20"><P class="p57 ft2">oder</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td120"><P class="p70 ft2">ihrer</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr5 td135"><P class="p71 ft2">kala myndigheter, i den mån be-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr5 td194"><P class="p15 ft2">Gebietskörperschaften</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td11"><P class="p70 ft2">erhoben</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td135"><P class="p71 ft2">skattningen inte strider mot detta</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">werden, geschuldet wird, soweit</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td135"><P class="p71 ft2">avtal eller mot något annat in-</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td41"><P class="p15 ft2">die</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td174"><P class="p15 ft2">entsprechende</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td57"><P class="p70 ft9">Besteuerung</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr5 td135"><P class="p71 ft2">strument till vilket de avtals-</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td41"><P class="p15 ft2">nicht</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td123"><P class="p101 ft2">diesem</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr5 td153"><P class="p50 ft2">Abkommen</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td120"><P class="p70 ft2">oder</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td135"><P class="p71 ft2">slutande staterna är parter, samt</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td109"><P class="p15 ft2">anderen</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td159"><P class="p70 ft2">Übereinkünften, denen</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td116"><P class="p71 ft2">ränta,</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td162"><P class="p83 ft2">administrativa</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td132"><P class="p50 ft2">straffavgifter</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td41"><P class="p15 ft2">die</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td174"><P class="p15 ft2">Vertragsstaaten</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td113"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td11"><P class="p70 ft9">beigetreten</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr5 td135"><P class="p71 ft2">och kostnader för indrivning eller</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td41"><P class="p15 ft2">sind,</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr5 td174"><P class="p24 ft2">widerspricht,</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td73"><P class="p111 ft2">sowie</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td120"><P class="p70 ft2">mit</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td135"><P class="p71 ft2">säkringsåtgärd som hänför sig till</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td109"><P class="p15 ft2">diesem</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td75"><P class="p15 ft2">Betrag</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td101"><P class="p70 ft2">zusammenhän-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td183"><P class="p71 ft2">sådant belopp.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td86"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td139"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td84"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">gende Zinsen, Geldbußen sowie</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td116"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td65"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td123"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td86"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td139"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td84"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr5 td69"><P class="p15 ft9">Vollstreckungskosten und Kosten</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td134"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td116"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td65"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td123"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td86"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td139"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td84"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td189"><P class="p15 ft2">für Sicherungsmaßnahmen.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td120"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr19 td134"><P class="p98 ft2">42</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=13 class="tr19 td21"><P class="p111 ft24"><SPAN class="ft23">23 </SPAN>Artikel 30 har fått denna lydelse genom ändringsprotokollet den 18 januari 2023.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr19 td120"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

	<TD width=20px></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr2 td56"><P class="p51 ft2">3. När</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr2 td139"><P class="p15 ft2">en</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr2 td158"><P class="p1 ft2">skattefordran</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr2 td42"><P class="p103 ft2">i</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr2 td42"><P class="p50 ft2">en</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr2 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">(3) Ist ein Steueranspruch eines</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td100"><P class="p15 ft2">avtalsslutande</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td166"><P class="p50 ft2">stat är verkställbar</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td156"><P class="p15 ft2">Vertragsstaats</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td11"><P class="p56 ft2">nach dem</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td18"><P class="p17 ft2">Recht</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">enligt denna stats lagstiftning och</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td89"><P class="p15 ft9">dieses</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td109"><P class="p72 ft2">Staates</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td158"><P class="p15 ft2">vollstreckbar</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td136"><P class="p17 ft9">und</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">fordran ska betalas av en person</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">wird er von einer Person geschul-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">som enligt lagstiftningen i denna</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr5 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">det, die zu diesem Zeitpunkt nach</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">stat saknar rätt att vid denna</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">dem Recht dieses Staates die</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">tidpunkt förhindra dess indrivning,</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td156"><P class="p15 ft2">Vollstreckung</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td84"><P class="p74 ft2">nicht</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td48"><P class="p17 ft2">verhindern</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">ska denna skattefordran, på begäran</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr5 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">kann, so wird dieser Steueran-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">av den behöriga myndigheten i</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">spruch auf Ersuchen der zu-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">denna stat, erkännas för indrivning</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">ständigen Behörde dieses Staates</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">av den behöriga myndigheten i den</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr5 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">für die Zwecke der Erhebung von</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">andra avtalsslutande staten. Denna</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td160"><P class="p15 ft2">der zuständigen</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td117"><P class="p71 ft2">Behörde</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td136"><P class="p17 ft2">des</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">skattefordran ska drivas in av den</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p17 ft9">anderen Vertragsstaats anerkannt.</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">andra staten enligt bestämmelserna</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr5 td53"><P class="p17 ft9">Der Steueranspruch wird von dem</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">i denna stats lagstiftning om verk-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td112"><P class="p15 ft2">anderen</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td91"><P class="p56 ft2">Staat</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td164"><P class="p123 ft2">nach</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td18"><P class="p17 ft9">dessen</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">ställighet och indrivning som om</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">Rechtsvorschriften über die Voll-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">fordran vore en av dess egna</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td112"><P class="p15 ft9">streckung</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td126"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td118"><P class="p15 ft2">und</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td117"><P class="p1 ft2">Erhebung</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td136"><P class="p17 ft2">der</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td189"><P class="p15 ft2">skattefordringar.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td42"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td42"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td112"><P class="p15 ft2">eigenen</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td91"><P class="p74 ft2">Steuern</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td117"><P class="p101 ft2">erhoben,</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td136"><P class="p17 ft2">als</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td56"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td139"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td158"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td42"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td42"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">handelte es sich bei dem Steuer-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td56"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td139"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td158"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td42"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td42"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr5 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">anspruch um einen Steueran-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td56"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td139"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td158"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td42"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td42"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">spruch dieses anderen Staates.</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td56"><P class="p51 ft2">4. När</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td139"><P class="p15 ft2">en</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td158"><P class="p1 ft2">skattefordran</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td42"><P class="p103 ft2">i</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td42"><P class="p50 ft2">en</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">(4) Handelt es sich bei einem</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">avtalsslutande stat enligt dess lag-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr5 td156"><P class="p15 ft2">Steueranspruch</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td84"><P class="p71 ft2">eines</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td48"><P class="p17 ft2">Vertrags-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">stiftning kan bli föremål för säk-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">staats um einen Anspruch, bei</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">ringsåtgärder i syfte att säkerställa</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">dem dieser Staat nach seinem</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">indrivningen ska denna skattefor-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr5 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">Recht Maßnahmen zur Sicherung</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">dran, på begäran av den behöriga</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">der Erhebung erlassen kann, so</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">myndigheten i denna stat, erkännas</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td89"><P class="p15 ft2">wird</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td118"><P class="p15 ft2">dieser</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td102"><P class="p58 ft9">Steueranspruch</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td136"><P class="p17 ft2">auf</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">för vidtagande av säkringsåtgärder</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr5 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">Ersuchen der zuständigen Be-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">av den behöriga myndigheten i den</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">hörde dieses Staates zum Zweck</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">andra avtalsslutande staten. Den</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">der Einleitung von Sicherungs-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">andra staten ska vidta säkringsåt-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr5 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">maßnahmen durch die zuständige</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">gärder avseende denna skatteford-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">Behörde des anderen Vertrags-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">ran enligt bestämmelserna i dess</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td89"><P class="p15 ft2">staats</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td71"><P class="p62 ft2">anerkannt. Dieser</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td18"><P class="p17 ft2">andere</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">lagstiftning som om denna vore en</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td89"><P class="p15 ft2">Staat</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td118"><P class="p15 ft2">leitet</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td44"><P class="p103 ft2">in</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr5 td110"><P class="p17 ft2">Übereinstimmung</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">av dess egna skattefordringar. Detta</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">mit den eigenen Rechtsvor-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">gäller även om skattefordringen vid</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td112"><P class="p15 ft2">schriften</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td148"><P class="p17 ft2">Sicherungsmaßnahmen</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">tidpunkten då sådana åtgärder vid-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr5 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">in Bezug auf diesen Steueran-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">tas inte är verkställbar i den först-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">spruch ein, als wäre der Steuer-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">nämnda staten eller ska betalas av</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td112"><P class="p15 ft2">anspruch</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td126"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td44"><P class="p53 ft2">ein</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td126"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr4 td162"><P class="p17 ft9">Steueranspruch</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">en person som har rätt att förhindra</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td89"><P class="p15 ft9">dieses</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr5 td106"><P class="p24 ft2">anderen</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td164"><P class="p15 ft2">Staates,</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td18"><P class="p17 ft2">selbst</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td189"><P class="p15 ft2">dess indrivning.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td42"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td42"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td53"><P class="p17 ft2">wenn der Steueranspruch im Zeit-</P></TD>

	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td33"><P class="p71 ft2">ning och därmed sammanhängande</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr5 td81"><P class="p15 ft2">der sind als die Besteuerung und</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr15 td103"><P class="p15 ft22"><SPAN class="ft26">24 </SPAN>Artiklarna <NOBR>31–37</NOBR> har upphävts genom ändringsprotokollet den 18 januari 2023.</P></TD>
	<TD rowspan=2 class="tr16 td15"><P class="p17 ft2">45</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr5 td103"><P class="p15 ft24"><SPAN class="ft23">25 </SPAN>Artikel 38 punkt 1 har fått denna lydelse genom ändringsprotokollet den 18 januari 2023.</P></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 class="t8">
<TR>
	<TD class="tr2 td67"><P class="p15 ft2">Prop. 2022/23:118</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr2 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">fråga fick vetskap om den åtgärd</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr2 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">Der Fall muss innerhalb von drei</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">som givit upphov till beskattning</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">Jahren nach der ersten Mitteilung</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">som strider mot bestämmelserna i</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">der Maßnahme unterbreitet wer-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td30"><P class="p15 ft2">avtalet.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td95"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">den, die zu einer dem Abkommen</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td64"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td48"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td95"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td183"><P class="p15 ft2">nicht entsprechenden</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td7"><P class="p17 ft2">Besteue-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td64"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td48"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td95"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td183"><P class="p15 ft2">rung führt.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td65"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td46"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p50 ft2">2. Om den behöriga myndigheten</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p17 ft2">(2) Hält die zuständige Behörde</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">finner invändningen grundad men</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td183"><P class="p15 ft2">die Einwendung für</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td7"><P class="p70 ft9">begründet</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">inte själv kan få till stånd en till-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft9">und ist sie selbst nicht in der Lage,</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">fredsställande lösning, ska myn-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">eine befriedigende Lösung her-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">digheten söka lösa frågan genom</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">beizuführen, so wird sie sich be-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">ömsesidig överenskommelse med</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">mühen, den Fall durch Verständi-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">den behöriga myndigheten i den</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">gung mit der zuständigen Be-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">andra avtalsslutande staten i syfte</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">hörde des anderen Vertragsstaats</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">att undvika beskattning som strider</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">so zu regeln, dass eine dem</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td64"><P class="p15 ft2">mot</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td48"><P class="p73 ft2">avtalet.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td95"><P class="p50 ft2">Överenskommelse</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">Abkommen nicht entsprechende</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">som träffats ska genomföras utan</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">Besteuerung vermieden wird. Die</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">hinder av tidsgränser i de avtals-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft9">Verständigungsregelung ist unge-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">slutande staternas interna lagstift-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">achtet der Fristen des innerstaat-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td64"><P class="p15 ft2">ning.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td48"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td95"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">lichen Rechts der Vertragsstaaten</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td64"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td48"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td95"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td183"><P class="p15 ft2">durchzuführen.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td65"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td46"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p50 ft2">3. De behöriga myndigheterna i</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td183"><P class="p51 ft2">(3) Die zuständigen</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td7"><P class="p70 ft2">Behörden</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">de avtalsslutande staterna ska ge-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td150"><P class="p15 ft2">der Vertragsstaaten werden</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td46"><P class="p70 ft2">sich</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td64"><P class="p15 ft2">nom</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td48"><P class="p15 ft2">ömsesidig</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td95"><P class="p50 ft2">överenskommelse</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td150"><P class="p15 ft2">bemühen, Schwierigkeiten</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td46"><P class="p70 ft9">oder</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">söka avgöra svårigheter eller tvi-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">Zweifel, die bei der Auslegung</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">velsmål som uppkommer i fråga</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">oder Anwendung des Abkom-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">om tolkningen eller tillämpningen</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">mens entstehen, durch Verständi-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">av avtalet. De kan även överlägga i</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">gung zu beseitigen. Sie können</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">syfte att undanröja dubbelbeskatt-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">auch gemeinsam beraten, um eine</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">ning i fall som inte omfattas av</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">Doppelbesteuerung in Fällen, die</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td30"><P class="p15 ft2">detta avtal.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td95"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td183"><P class="p15 ft2">im Abkommen nicht</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td7"><P class="p70 ft2">behandelt</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td64"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td48"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td95"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td183"><P class="p15 ft2">sind, zu beseitigen.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td65"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td46"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p50 ft2">4. De behöriga myndigheterna i</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td183"><P class="p51 ft2">(4) Die zuständigen</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td7"><P class="p70 ft2">Behörden</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">de avtalsslutande staterna kan träda</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td150"><P class="p15 ft2">der Vertragsstaaten können</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td46"><P class="p70 ft2">zur</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">i direkt förbindelse med varandra i</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">Herbeiführung einer Einigung im</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">syfte att träffa överenskommelse i</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">Sinne der Absätze 1 bis 3 unmit-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">de fall som angivits i föregående</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">telbar miteinander verkehren.</P></TD>
</TR>

	<TD class="tr5 td67"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>

<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">anses ha tillfallit andra personer</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td81"><P class="p15 ft2">zung für diese Einkünfte zusteht</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td26"><P class="p15 ft2">som</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td152"><P class="p15 ft2">kunnat</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td142"><P class="p78 ft2">tillgodogöra</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td20"><P class="p50 ft2">sig</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td81"><P class="p15 ft2">und die nicht in dem erstge-</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">inkomsten och som inte har</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td81"><P class="p15 ft2">nannten Staat ansässig sind.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">hemvist i den förstnämnda staten.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td121"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td13"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td98"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td129"><P class="p51 ft2">4.<SPAN class="ft14">30 </SPAN>Utan</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td164"><P class="p101 ft2">hinder</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td126"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td127"><P class="p50 ft2">av övriga</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td121"><P class="p24 ft2">(4) Ungeachtet</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td13"><P class="p101 ft2">der</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td98"><P class="p76 ft2">sonstigen</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">bestämmelser i detta avtal ska en</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td121"><P class="p15 ft2">Bestimmungen</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td13"><P class="p15 ft2">dieses</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td98"><P class="p76 ft2">Abkom-</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">förmån enligt avtalet inte ges i fråga</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td81"><P class="p15 ft2">mens wird eine Vergünstigung</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">om en inkomst eller en förmögen-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td81"><P class="p15 ft2">nach dem Abkommen nicht für</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">hetstillgång, om det med hänsyn till</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td81"><P class="p15 ft2">bestimmte Einkünfte oder Ver-</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">alla relevanta fakta och omständig-</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td81"><P class="p15 ft2">mögenswerte gewährt, wenn un-</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">heter rimligen kan antas att ett av de</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td81"><P class="p15 ft2">ter Berücksichtigung aller maßge-</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td97"><P class="p15 ft2">huvudsakliga</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr5 td73"><P class="p15 ft2">syftena</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td60"><P class="p101 ft2">med</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td20"><P class="p50 ft2">det</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td81"><P class="p15 ft2">blichen Tatsachen und Umstände</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">arrangemang eller den transaktion</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td81"><P class="p15 ft2">die Feststellung gerechtfertigt ist,</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">som direkt eller indirekt resulterade</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td81"><P class="p15 ft2">dass der Erhalt dieser Vergünsti-</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td15"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P class="p131 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">i</SPAN><SPAN class="ft33">förmånen var att få förmånen, gung einer der Hauptzwecke einer såvida det inte fastställs att det Gestaltung oder Transaktion war, under omständigheterna är fören- die unmittelbar oder mittelbar zu ligt med de relevanta bestämmel- dieser Vergünstigung geführt hat, sernas ändamål och syfte att för- es sei denn, es wird nachgewie-</SPAN></P>
<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 class="t5">
<TR>
	<TD class="tr18 td50"><P class="p15 ft2">månen ges.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr18 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">sen, dass die Gewährung dieser</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">Vergünstigung unter diesen Um-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">ständen mit dem Ziel und Zweck</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">der einschlägigen Bestimmungen</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td50"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">des Abkommens im Einklang</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td50"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td53"><P class="p15 ft2">steht.</P></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 class="t21">
<TR>
	<TD class="tr2 td222"><P class="p15 ft22"><SPAN class="ft26">30 </SPAN>Artikel 43 punkt 4 har tillkommit genom ändringsprotokollet den 18 januari 2023.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr2 td100"><P class="p17 ft2">51</P></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td148"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td91"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td87"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td44"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td41"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td120"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td136"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td145"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td89"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td60"><P class="p15 ft2">zuläßt.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td79"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td43"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td86"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td107"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td23"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td115"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td89"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td148"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr5 td68"><P class="p50 ft2">2. Ansökan om återbetalning av</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr5 td69"><P class="p70 ft2">(2) Die Anträge auf Erstattung</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td148"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td76"><P class="p15 ft2">innehållen</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td152"><P class="p1 ft2">källskatt</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td120"><P class="p78 ft2">på</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td76"><P class="p50 ft2">utdelning,</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">müssen vor dem Ende des vierten</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td148"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">ränta, royalty eller annan inkomst</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">auf das Kalenderjahr der Zahlung</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td148"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr5 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">måste göras före utgången av det</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr5 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">der Dividenden, Zinsen, Lizenz-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td148"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=8 class="tr4 td68"><P class="p15 ft2">fjärde kalenderåret efter det år då</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">gebühren oder anderen Einkünfte</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td148"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr4 td124"><P class="p15 ft2">utbetalningen gjordes.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td136"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td145"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td89"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=9 class="tr4 td69"><P class="p15 ft2">folgenden Jahres eingereicht wer-</P></TD>

<TR>

	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td34"><P class="p73 ft2">Januar des</P></TD>

<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td148"><P class="p105 ft2">56</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td186"><P class="p15 ft2">förmögenhet, på skatt som tas ut på</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr4 td185"><P class="p73 ft2">folgt, und bei den Steuern vom</P></TD>

<DIV id="page_57">


<DIV id="id_1">
<DIV id="id_1_1">
<P class="p133 ft2">förmögenhetstillgångar som inne- has den 1 januari kalenderåret närmast efter det då uppsägning skedde eller senare,</P>
<P class="p134 ft2">b)<SPAN class="ft14">32 </SPAN>beträffande handräckning, som verkställs den 1 januari ka- lenderåret närmast efter det då upp- sägning skedde eller senare.</P>
<P class="p135 ft2">Som skedde i Bonn den 14 juli 1992 i två exemplar på tyska och svenska språken, vilka båda texter äger lika vitsord.</P>
<P class="p136 ft2">För Konungariket Sverige: <SPAN class="ft3">Torsten Örn</SPAN></P>
<P class="p137 ft2">För Förbundsrepubliken Tyskland:</P>
<P class="p138 ft3">Theodor Weigl</P>
<P class="p49 ft3">Harmut Hillgenberg</P>
</DIV>

	<TD colspan=3 class="tr5 td208"><P class="p15 ft15">skatteundandragande<SPAN class="ft34">33</SPAN></P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td99"><P class="p15 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>

</TR>
